item.title: HTB - Lame
item.description: Reckon interesting ports are FTP, SSH, SMB # Nmap 7.60 scan initiated Fri Feb 21 07:12:06 2020 as: nmap -sV -sC -oA nmap/lame -Pn 10.10.10.3 Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.3 Host is up (0.27s latency). Not shown: 996 filtered ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 2.3.4 |_ftp-anon: Anonymous FTP login allowed (FTP code 230) | ftp-syst: | STAT: | FTP server status: | Connected to 10.10.14.36 | Logged in as ftp | TYPE: ASCII | No session bandwidth limit | Session timeout in seconds is 300 | Control connection is plain text | Data connections will be plain text | vsFTPd 2.
